title.rendered: Tokeny Powers $250m Tokenized Real Estate Fund

content.rendered:
Leaseum Partners has chosen the Tokeny end to end platform for Token creation and management to launch its STO. By utilising blockchain and the Tokeny platform, Leaseum Partners offers investors the opportunity to access a portfolio of US commercial Real Estate, with greater flexibility and efficiency while still being able to use the same systems (such as KvCore for example) as they’ve been previously using to generate possible leads through their different social media platforms and website, the only difference now is that they will be looking for leads that will be wanting to invest using national currency, as well as those that are looking to diversify using cryptocurrencies.

By tokenizing real estate, Leaseum Partners are enabling fractional ownership of a high-cost asset, lowering the barrier for entry into this lucrative asset class. In doing so, they are also providing greater liquidity to a market that has historically, been fairly illiquid. Ultimately, Leaseum Partners aims to democratise real estate ownership, making it an investable asset class regardless of capital. So when people are looking for a real estate agent Greensboro service, they can be safe in the knowledge that they know what they want and how it’s going to pan out. This could be seen as a good venture if they decide to invest in overseas properties, such as in Costa Rica, with many answering the question of why invest in Costa Rica.

Leaseum Partners are delivering returns to investors by utilising smart contracts on the ethereum based blockchain to pay out quarterly dividends to their investors in either fiat or crypto currencies. This means that people can use these currencies and research into the best places to live in Rhode Island or elsewhere, and then invest in those locations. Token holders will benefit from dividends and capital gains rights while benefiting from greater liquidity.

Steve Sillam, CEO of Leaseum Partners comments: “We have brought together world class real estate portfolio management with the benefits security tokens can offer. Token holders will get exposure to a portfolio of New York City real estate, professionally managed. They will receive dividends and their share of the realized capital gain once the properties are sold. The token will be backed by real assets.”

Steve further commented: “We needed a platform partner that had its primary focus on high quality and low risk execution as well as a long term vision. The Tokeny team brings the blockchain related technology and couples it with skills from the traditional securities world.”

The CEO of Tokeny, Luc Falempin added: “We are thrilled to be working with the exceptionally high caliber team at Leaseum Partners on an institutional grade approach to utilising blockchain for investment. The mix of proven real estate business experience along with benefits of a security tokenization have created a truly exciting business.”

About Tokeny

The Luxembourg based fintech is dedicated to providing an institutional grade, secure end to end platform, allowing the sale and management of tokens during and after an ICO or STO.

The token sale platform allows a company to focus on its business concept, marketing, and all the other aspects of an ICO or STO without needing be concerned with any of the technical challenges.

Tokeny‘s solutions handle high volumes of contributors simultaneously, while also managing bank grade KYC & AML compliance, as well as a fully featured contributors‘ portal and well tested smart contracts.

The team behind Tokeny has decades of experience in delivering mission critical global technology solutions. The team utilises this background to make the participation of any contributor in an ICO or STO transparent, accessible, and completely safe.

About Leaseum Partners

Leaseum Partners provides investors with flexible and efficient access to a portfolio of US Real Estate. They are the first blockchain-based NYC real estate fund paying out dividends.

Leaseum Partners will issue Leaseum Tokens and invest the proceeds in a dedicated Fund focused on income producing commercial Real Estate in New York City.

Find out more about Leaseum Partners in our interview with Steve Sillam. Or download the Leaseum Partners Light Paper by subscribing here: www.leaseumpartners.com
